titleStmt.title: The presentment and humble petition of the Grand Jury for the county of Middlesex to the Honourable and Right Worshipful the Justice of the Peace for the county of Middlesex, at this present general sessions held at Hick's Hall, begun the 18th day of May, 1681.
titleStmt.author: Middlesex (England). Grand Jury.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
